title: gAna rasikE gAna vErevaru
sahitya:
gAna rasikE gAna vErEvaru gAna rakSimpa nanu mudA sadA


anupallavi

  mAnita guNa nigamAgama sannutE mAdhava mAnini kAma mada damani


caraNam    manjuLa mukhi shamadamAdi sadguNa ranjanI mangaLa pradAyinI 
anjanayuta kanja daLa nayani niranjani jananI mOhana muraLI
